age.Description: Age of the participant at time of testing

awakenings.Description: Number of times the participant was awakened during sedation

TMS.Description: Indicates if Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (TMS) was applied

tms_count.Description: Number of TMS sessions the participant received

excluded.Description: Indicates if the participant was excluded from the experiment

bad_after_preprocessing.Description: List of TMS sessions marked as bad after preprocessing due to data quality issues
